name: Zoram repels the Lamnanite armies and rescues the captives of Noah
description: Zoram repels the Lamanite armies and rescues the captives of Noah, after Alma the Younger receives a revelation from the Lord.
participants: Zoram, Chief Captain of the Nephite armies

location.name: South wilderness
location.description: crossed over the river Sidon, with their armies, and marched away beyond the borders of Manti into the south wilderness, which was on the east side of the river Sidon.
